title: Unable to connect to chat, you may reconnect manually.
body:
Hi all I am having a frustrating issue with league of legends.

I cannot load the chat, (I am aware that this was an issue in the downtime some 30min ago, however my friends are able to login issue free now while I am still having the issue).  

Any ideas on how to fix it?   {{item:3151}} 



Just to clarify, this stops be playing online with friends and reconnecting does not fix the issue.

replies.body: I too am having the same issue! I'm trying to play with ~~golf~~ friends but the chat won't load and I do not appear as online. {{summoner:2}}

I believe that this is a Riot services issue; as such, the best thing to do would be to wait for the services to come back up, although I believe that the issue has been resolved. Can you confirm whether this is the case?
